login.subtitle: Sign in to your account
login.credentials: Enter your credentials to access your account
login.googleAuthError: There was an error authenticating with Google

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address
validation.invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.

index.title: Find Your Perfect Roommate Match
index.subtitle: Connect with compatible roommates based on lifestyle, habits, and preferences. Say goodbye to roommate nightmares!
index.ready: Ready to find your ideal roommate?
index.joinThousands: Join thousands of people who have found their perfect match.

roommate.title: How It Works
roommate.subtitle: Finding the perfect roommate is easy with our guided process
roommate.step1Description: Choose between 'Host My Space' or 'Seek & Settle'. Then select your living plan tier: Basic, Comfort, or Elite.
roommate.step2Description: Sign up and create your detailed profile, including your lifestyle preferences, habits, and what you're looking for in a roommate.
roommate.step3Description: Browse potential roommates or properties, swipe right on profiles you like, and start conversations when you match.
roommate.step4Description: Once you've found the perfect match, arrange meetings, discuss details, and finalize your new living arrangement.

pathSelection.title: How would you like to Team Up?
pathSelection.subtitle: Tell us about your situation so we can match you with the perfect roommates or properties.
pathSelection.hostSpaceDesc: I already have a place and I'm looking for someone to share it with.
pathSelection.seekSettleDesc: I want to find a compatible roommate first, then we'll find a place together.
pathSelection.pleaseSelect: Please select your path to continue

profileCreation.title: Create Your Profile
profileCreation.subtitle: Tell us about yourself to help find your perfect roommate match.
profileCreation.openToAllNationalities: Open to living with all nationalities
profileCreation.openToAllNationalitiesDesc: Check this if you're comfortable living with people from any background
profileCreation.roomDetailsDesc: Upload photos and provide details about the room or bed space you're offering.
profileCreation.roomDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe your room or bed space in detail (size, furnishings, window, etc.)
profileCreation.roomDescriptionHelp: Provide details about your room/space to help potential roommates understand what you're offering
profileCreation.sharedFacilitiesPlaceholder: List all facilities you're willing to share (kitchen, bathroom, living room, wifi, etc.)
profileCreation.sharedFacilitiesHelp: Clearly mention which facilities will be shared with roommates
profileCreation.nearbyAmenitiesDesc: Help potential roommates understand your location and nearby facilities.
profileCreation.mapLinkDesc: Paste a link to Google Maps or any other map service showing your property location

matching.title: Find Your Perfect Match
matching.subtitle: Swipe right on roommates you're interested in, left on those you're not.
matching.matchDesc: You matched with {{name}}. You can now message them.
matching.checkBack: No more profiles to show at the moment. Check back later!
matching.messagingSoon: Messaging functionality will be implemented soon.

payment.enterDetails: Enter your payment details to activate your {{plan}} Living plan

livingPlan.selectOption: Select the option that best fits your needs and preferences.
livingPlan.soloDesc: Enjoy the peace and privacy of your own space.
livingPlan.roommateDesc: Connect with compatible roommates and share a space.
livingPlan.pleaseSelect: Please select a living plan to continue.
livingPlan.soloSelected: You've selected Solo Living. Let's continue!
livingPlan.roommateSelected: You've selected Find a Roommate. Let's continue!

properties.browseProperties: Browse available properties that match your needs and budget.
properties.viewAllAvailable: View all available properties from our listings
properties.basicDescription: Affordable and functional living spaces for budget-conscious renters
properties.comfortDescription: Mid-range properties with modern amenities and convenient locations
properties.eliteDescription: Premium properties with luxury features, spacious layouts and exclusive locations
properties.tryChangingSearch: Try changing your search terms or filters.
properties.selectRoommateToShare: Select a roommate match to share this property with.
properties.noMatches: You don't have any matches yet.

listProperty.title: List Your Property
listProperty.subtitle: Complete the form below to list your property and reach potential tenants or buyers.
listProperty.accurateInfo: Provide accurate information to help people find your property.
listProperty.contractDesc: Select the contract duration you're offering for this property
listProperty.mapLinkDesc: Paste a link to Google Maps or any other map service showing your property location
listProperty.mainImageUrlDesc: You can upload multiple images below or provide a URL for the main image
listProperty.tagsDesc: Add tags that highlight key features of your property
listProperty.descriptionPlaceholderBasic: Describe your Basic property in detail. Include key features like proximity to public transport, nearby facilities, etc. This is an affordable property option.
listProperty.descriptionPlaceholderComfort: Describe your Comfort property in detail. Highlight the modern amenities, quality fixtures, neighborhood benefits, etc. This is a mid-range property with attractive features.
listProperty.descriptionPlaceholderElite: Describe your Elite property in detail. Emphasize premium features, luxury finishes, exclusive location benefits, etc. This is a high-end property with exceptional quality.
listProperty.reviewNotice: All listings are reviewed by our team before going live
listProperty.success: Property listing submitted successfully! It will be reviewed by our team.

contact.contactDesc: We're here to answer any questions you might have. Feel free to reach out and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.sendMessageDesc: We'd love to hear from you. Please fill out the form below with your inquiry.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.messagePlaceholder: Please provide details about your inquiry...
contact.messageSentDesc: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.messageFailedDesc: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.

about.title: About Team Up
about.mission: Our mission is to simplify the roommate discovery process in Saudi Arabia, making shared living accessible, safe, and enjoyable for everyone.
about.platformDesc1: Team Up is Saudi Arabia's premier roommate matching platform, designed to connect compatible people looking for shared living arrangements. Whether you're a student, young professional, or relocating to a new city, we help you find the perfect living situation.
about.platformDesc2: Using advanced matching algorithms and detailed preference settings, we take the guesswork out of finding a compatible roommate. Our platform focuses on safety, compatibility, and creating lasting living arrangements.
features: Verified profiles for safety and trust
Flexible living plans for every budget
about.basicPlanDesc: Perfect for students and budget-conscious individuals looking for affordable shared living options.
about.comfortPlanDesc: For young professionals seeking quality shared accommodations with added comfort and convenience.
comfortFeatures: Monthly virtual events with potential roommates
about.elitePlanDesc: Exclusive access to luxury shared living spaces and premium roommate matching services.
eliteFeatures: Priority access to luxury property listings
about.readyToFind: Ready to Find Your Perfect Roommate?
about.joinThousands: Join thousands of users who found their ideal living situation through Team Up.
